summary: Scrambling up their last money, two dudes journey to Mallorca to fullfill their dream and participate in Europe's most famous beach parties.
cast: Tom Gerhardt|Hilmi Sözer|Christoph M. Ohrt|Diana Frank|Ralph Willmann|Detlef Bothe|Dierk Prawdzik|Katja Flint|Uwe Ochsenknecht|Ottfried Fischer|Martin Armknecht|Jürgen Drews|Katrin Meincke|Edda Fischer|Anja Roy|Willi Thomczyk|Tanja de Wendt|Knacki Deuser|Imke Brügger|Jacqueline Jeske|Ullo|Nicolay Weller|Russ Lukas Jukic|Nicolai Stahl|Manuel Mera|Miguel Rodríguez|Francisca Forteza|Carlos Ripoll|Andrea Thiele|Jean-Luc Cuozzo|Hartmut Kunze|Renco Bruhn|Alberto Klein|Raúl Martín|Achim Brock|Manfred Tauchen|Nico van Rijn|Helmut Schafzahl|Francisco Márquez|José A. Nieto|Michael Szekely|Catherine Leclery|Birgit Stein|Miguel A. Juan|Hans-Gerd Kilbinger|Primitivo Daza|Manuel Barceló|Manuel Castellá|Agustín Julio Roldán|Jürgen Hahn|Jean-Theo Jost|Dirc Seemann|Horst Günter Kestel|Sonia Sgrai|Sonja Buse|Gabriele Schulze|Dora Brockmann|Erika Kamp|Thomas Binder
title: Balneario 6: Dos guiris muy guiris
